caption.p: Key scientific contributions of Program Science and future directions

tr.td: 1. Geographical mapping 2. Hotspots-spatial distribution of epidemics 3. Transmission dynamics
1. Rapid ethnographic assessments and enhanced geographical mapping 2. Micro-level (within city) appraisals of risk clusters 3. Program design by epidemic phase
1. Intervention mix 2. Community engagement and mobilization
1. Delivery platforms for agentic, individual and structural interventions 2. Context specific adaptation
1. Complex systems evaluation 2. Real time evaluation for responsive adaptation 3. Optimized indicators aligned to program stage
